ygData.subject: Re: undead/summoned spells?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not weaker - just given at a later level.  I believe I got Expulse Summoned at level 19.  Same mana/damage ratio. -- We cross our bridges when we come to
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 16 Jul 1999, ken satchell "flash-net & nikken distrubter" wrote:

> Hey I was wondering on the undead and summoning line of spells What is the
> mana requirements and amount of dmg? I believe the cleric gets both.
> Think the druid only gets the summoned side. But are the clerics summoned
> weaker? Level of spell also please?

Not weaker - just given at a later level. I believe I got Expulse
Summoned at level 19. Same mana/damage ratio.
--
We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell
of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
